alert.note: Alert for Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 23 at 3:58AM MDT until April 23 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...The Northern Front Range Foothills, and The Southern Front Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet
